code: 'use strict';var base64=require('base64-js');function binaryToBase64(data){if(data instanceof ArrayBuffer){data=new Uint8Array(data);}if(data instanceof Uint8Array){return base64.fromByteArray(data);}if(!ArrayBuffer.isView(data)){throw new Error('data must be ArrayBuffer or typed array');}var _ref=data,buffer=_ref.buffer,byteOffset=_ref.byteOffset,byteLength=_ref.byteLength;return base64.fromByteArray(new Uint8Array(buffer,byteOffset,byteLength));}module.exports=binaryToBase64;
